ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: then split the earth into furrows.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We cracked the earth open under pressure (of germination)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and cleaved the earth, cleaving it asunder;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and let the earth to break open
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then We split the earth properly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We split the earth in clefts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We cleave the earth, cleaving (it) asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then We split the earth in fissures
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then split the earth in clefts
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and then We cleaved the earth asunder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thereafter We cleave the earth in clefts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then We split the earth making fissures in it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We split the earth in fragments,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We split the earth in clefts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:26] then We split the earth into fissures, with vegetation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then split the earth in clefts) through plants
